1420167254617071618.text: Over the coming days and weeks, America is going to learn a lot more about Mike Enzi. 1420167253589471232.text: It was more than the policy for Mike. He loved the people – all people. We couldn’t go anywhere without him packing hundreds of soccer balls to give away to the kids. And it wasn’t just soccer balls. He brought shoes too.

1420167252557578241.text: Mike was a quiet leader of the Senate. When he talked, everyone listened. That’s a rare quality in a Senator. He was humble. He kept the people as his focus, knowing that by doing so, the solutions would follow.

1420167251664285696.text: My heart is heavy today because—like so many of my colleagues—I’m mourning the death of my dearest friend, Senator Mike Enzi of Wyoming. I say dearest friend, because he is.

1259991444397359104.text: Taiwan has donated countless medical supplies around the world, including the U.S., and has been a leader in treatment, research and information sharing.
